path.description: Name of the file in which the generated TLS/SSL private key will be written. It will have 0600 mode.

state.description: Whether the private key should exist or not, taking action if the state is different from what is stated.

force.description: Should the key be regenerated even it it already exists

type.description: The algorithm used to generate the TLS/SSL private key

size.description: Size (in bits) of the TLS/SSL key to generate
